hello.intro:
The [Capital Challenge Horse Show](https://www.pgparks.com/event_list/capital-challenge-horse-show) runs September 24–October 5, 2025 at the [Prince George Equestrian Center](https://www.pgparks.com) in Upper Marlboro, Maryland. Expect polished hunter, equitation, and jumper moments inside The Show Place Arena with a smooth ring flow and efficient operations that keep days moving.

Upper Marlboro sits close to the DMV hub, so downtime feels easy: suburban greenways, coffee in hand, and crisp early‑fall air on your walk between barn row and the jog strip. We keep the plan tight so you stay focused on warm‑up ring rhythm and vendor row resets between trips.
hello.outro: Keep the week simple and sport‑forward. I can book lodging, map one barn dinner, and prep essentials so you walk into Capital Challenge Horse Show ready to ride.

stay.title: Where to Stay
stay.paragraph: Set a calm base at the premium [Gaylord National Resort & Convention Center](https://www.marriott.com/en-us/hotels/wasgn-gaylord-national-resort-and-convention-center/overview/) or [The Hotel at The University of Maryland](https://www.thehotelumd.com), with a practical backup at [Courtyard by Marriott Largo Medical Center Drive](https://www.marriott.com/en-us/hotels/waslg-courtyard-largo-capital-beltway/overview/). Rooms align well with early warm‑ups and quick returns after last rounds.
stay.cta: Want it handled? I’ll lock rooms and sync confirmations.

items.name: The Hotel at The University of Maryland
Courtyard by Marriott Largo Medical Center Drive

dine.title: Dine
dine.am: Start light at [First Watch](https://www.firstwatch.com) for coffee, avocado toast, and eggs before schooling—fast and consistent near the venue.
dine.dinner: Post-round, keep it straightforward: [Copper Canyon Grill](https://www.coppercanyongrill.com) for steaks and rotisserie, [Grace’s Steak & Seafood](https://www.gracesrestaurants.com) for surf‑and‑turf with sushi, or [Sobe Restaurant & Lounge](https://www.soberestaurantandlounge.com) when the crew wants a scene.
dine.cta: I’ll map a barn‑friendly dinner loop with quick reservations.

locale.title: Locale — Off-Barn
locale.paragraph: Use short resets between trips: quick suburban park walks, a coffee run, or a quiet campus spin nearby. Keep energy for the ring, not the commute.

essentials.title: Essentials
essentials.paragraph: Stock up at [Giant Food Upper Marlboro](https://giantfood.com) and grab meds at [CVS Pharmacy Upper Marlboro](https://www.cvs.com). For barn needs, [Southern States Upper Marlboro Co‑op](https://www.southernstates.com) covers feed, bedding, and tack. Wheels handled by [Enterprise Rent‑A‑Car Largo](https://www.enterprise.com); golf carts via [Dever, Inc.](https://www.deverinc.com).
essentials.cta: I’ll pack a lean kit so nothing slows your rounds.

items.name: Giant Food Upper Marlboro
items.alt: Closest full‑service grocery to the showgrounds.

items.name: Enterprise Rent‑A‑Car Largo
items.alt: Closest rental branch with SUVs and vans.

items.name: Dever, Inc.
items.alt: Golf cart rentals coordinated with show office.
